snippet: An internal review of how the United Nations handled the bloody final months of Sri Lanka’s civil war in 2009 has concluded that the response was “a grave failure of the U.N.”
abstract: Internal review of how United Nations handled bloody final months of Sri Lanka’s civil war in 2009, when as many as 40,000 civilians were killed, concludes that response was failure.
lead_paragraph: An internal review of how the United Nations handled the bloody final months of Sri Lanka’s civil war in 2009 has concluded that the response was “a grave failure of the U.N.”

headline.main: Report Says U.N. Failed in Sri Lanka
headline.print_headline: Report Says U.N. Failed in Sri Lanka
